data.title: Raga Watch​
data.availSteps: Collect the offer from TCP App​ Click on ‘Shop Now’ and select products of your choice associated with the offer OR Walk into anyTitan store and select products of your choice associated with the offer​ Offer is auto-applied at checkout page or payment counter​
data.termsandconditions: Offer is applicable only on TCP App or on Titan stores​ This offer cannot be clubbed with any other existing offers ​ The offer can be availed only once per user​ In case of product return, the offer received will be deducted from the total bill value ​ In case of product return, amount will be refunded to the customer via the same payment instrument used during purchase​ In case of product return, loyalty points awarded to the customer will be cancelled​ Offer is valid only until stock last​ TCP & Titan reserve the rights to amend the T&C, end the offer, or call back any of the offers without prior notice​
